Hi! I'm Curro Campuzano, and this is a [Quarto Blog](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-blog.html) I've made as a small portfolio to share bioinformatics projects in which I am involved. I'm a Msc. Student in Bioinformatics at Aarhus University, and I'm an Open-Source enthusiast.
